entry.title: Setting up the Salo Lab website

link.title: Setting up the Salo Lab website

entry.content:
Today marks the first steps in building the Salo Lab website. The pages, layout, and structure are starting to come together — from the research overview to the team section and the first design elements for our visual identity. Much more will be added as the lab grows, but it’s exciting to see the foundation take shape.

Stay tuned for updates as we prepare for the official launch of the lab in 2026!
